content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. Diverse representation and nuanced roles written for women in theater and film are essential for the betterment of entertainment and to promote gender equity. Moving away from the stereotypical portrayal of women as supporting characters and love interests and providing opportunities for them to showcase their talent and ability as lead roles will not only empower women but also inspire future generations. It's about time that women are given the visibility and representation that they truly deserve in the entertainment industry.
